Articles.Content:
Foreword: This is made in KSP 0.21.1, but yeah, 0.21.

So yeah, I made a video about KSP 0.21 (0.21.1), and after showing stuffs, I immediately went on testing my Duna ship prototype, and well... Then I found a glitch about the Whack-a-Kerbal tool that disappears when leaving the gameplay scene before 0.21, but now persists even after leaving the gameplay scene.

R.I.P. Camgun, you will be missed.
